介.definition: to introduce; to lie between; between; shell; armor

介之推.definition: Jie Zhitui (7th century BC), legendary selfless subject of Duke Wen of Jin 晉文公|晋文公[Jin4 Wen2 gong1], in whose honor the Qingming festival 清明[Qing1 ming2] (Pure brightness or tomb-sweeping festival) is said to have been initiated

介休市.definition: Jiexiu, county-level city in Jinzhong 晉中市|晋中市[Jin4zhong1 Shi4], Shanxi

介意.definition: to care about; to take offense; to mind

介懷.definition: to mind; to brood over; to be concerned about

介紹.definition: to introduce (sb to sb); to give a presentation; to present (sb for a job etc); introduction

介紹信.definition: letter of introduction; recommendation letter; reference

介質訪問控制.pinyin: jiè zhì fǎng wèn kòng zhì

介質訪問控制層.pinyin: jiè zhì fǎng wèn kòng zhì céng
